name: Mortal Tetris
description:
Welcome to the first third-person-sovietic-versusFighting-multiplayer-puzzle-platformer-tetrominos game in the world !!!

Player 1 : You are Spoutnik , jumps using the mouse and try to reach the space

Player 2 : You are trying to crush the Spoutnik using WASDQE or ZQSDAE keys

This game is a beta made in 20h 24min updates are coming soon

I hope you're gonna leave a reply about your experience and glitches you meet (maybe)
